Row.Text: Hail, friend. What can I do for you?
Speak, friend, and enter... my throne room.
Greetings and salutations, fellow ruler!
Welcome, friend. Shall I prepare a feast to mark this occasion?
A pleasant day to you.
Hello! Bucephalus has grown quite fond of you, it seems.
My study is always open to a friend of liberty.
Do you have any stories to tell, friend? I have a thousand or so I could share with you, if you would like.
The great Quetzacoatl foretold of this meeting. What news do you bring?
I am late for my morning ritual, but I can spare a moment for you, if you'd like.
The Lord of the Nile speaks with you. What do you say in return?
I'm off to the theatre, but... I suppose we can chat, if only for a moment.
Hail, great leader. Do you have any great war stories to tell?
The Chancellor of Germany welcomes you. Come, let us discuss politics... Realpolitik, that is.
Namaste, wise leader. What sage advice do you seek from me?
Hello, friend. I've just returned from a hunt... would you like to see my trophies?
The spirits of my ancestors have told me much about you. All good things, I promise.
The Lawgiver welcomes you to his court. Come, let us discuss the finer points of leadership.
Greetings, noble friend. Come, let us converse while sitting on this luxurious rug I just received.
Hail, friend, I was just about to dine. Care for some salad? I made it myself.
Welcome back to my court, friend. I knew the Russian cold could not keep you away forever.
The Siamese people are moved by your return to our lands. How may we be of service?
Welcome back to my kingdom. Is it getting a bit hot around here, or is it just me?
Ah, it's good to see you again.
It's good to see you again.
The Blessings of Heaven be on you!
It is always a pleasure.
A delight, as always.
Will you be spending the apocalypse with me?
Greetings, dear.
A thousand welcomes.
How are you, friend?
Your empire is quite powerful. I do hope that you plan to only use such power for good.
Your military is terrifying. I am glad to be on your good side.
Your caravans and cargo ships dominate the world's trade unlike anything I've ever seen before. Truly an impressive sight.
Your people are wealthy and prosperous, and they have your wise leadership to thank for it.
Hail.
Yes?
How may I help you?
Good day, noble leader.
What brings you here today? Business, or pleasure?
Alexander of Macedon, at your service.
How may the President of the United States help you?
Welcome to Arabia; I do hope the sands were not too harsh for you.
Did you bring an offering for my altar?
The Empress Dowager of China greets you.
The great Pharaoh of Egypt is... happy to see you.
How may the English people help you?
Welcome to France. Shall I show you my art collection?
As Chancellor, I am formally and legally required to welcome you to Germany. So, welcome.
To what do I owe the honor of your presence?
I am humbled by your visit to India.
Peace be with you.
Have you come to go on a hunt with me, fair leader?
Welcome to beautiful Japan. Care to go for a walk through the cherry blossoms?
The Throne of Osman welcomes you.
The glorious riches of Persia lay before you.
Welcome to Rome. Come to watch the gladiatorial games, have you?
The Court of Rus welcomes you.
The Siamese people greet you.
Askia, the Bringer of Peace, welcomes you.
Well met.
Ah, back again.
Blessings be upon you.
A pleasant day to you.
Did you want something?
Welcome. Please ignore the screaming.
Have we met?
A good day to you, I hope.
What is it?
Why have you come here?
Go ahead, spit it out already.
This better be good.
You are brave, showing your face here.
Tremble before the mighty armies of Greece, fiend.
I find it hard to speak freely with tyrants such as yourself.
You are a fool to be my enemy. Do you not see what I do to my enemies?
The blood of my enemies flows from this shrine. Shall I add yours to the mix?
Wait a moment while I sharpen my sacrificial knife.
I have little patience for upstarts like you.
The Gods of Egypt do not look kindly on those as low as you.
You would be wise not to cross me. Shall I prepare a cell for you in the Tower?
You should be thankful that my grand military plans have not led to your downfall. Yet.
I am finding it quite difficult to remain cordial with you.
If this visit does not come with an apology, I'm not exactly sure why you are here.
You are a loudfooted oaf. Why have you come to my pristine hunting grounds?
I just finished sharpening my swords. Shall we test them?
Your presence here has put me in a foul mood. What do you want?
What makes you think that Darius of Persia wishes to speak with you?
The people of Rome told me that I shouldn't have let you in. I'm beginning to regret my decision.
There are only a handful of people I hate more than you. And they're all dead.
Congratulations, you have ruined what was otherwise a pleasant day.
The capital of my last foe burns around me. Shall yours be next?
Well? Speak up. I can barely hear you over the blood pounding in my brain.
I'm surprised to see you here. Shouldn't you be out settling new cities or something?
I think I saw your only soldiers walking around the other day. They looked sad and lonely. Perhaps you should train a few friends for them?
Your arrogance shall be your downfall, warmonger.
Weren't you just here?
Don't you have an empire to run?
Looking for a handout or something?
Now what?
My soldiers have lost the will to fight. Can I convince you to show them mercy?
It seems I've lost both the battle and the war. Can't we come to some sort of agreement?
I assume you are here to admit defeat?
Your destruction is complete. Admit it.
Why do you still fight? The war is over.
This war has gone on long enough, don't you think?
Too many of our bravest have perished in this conflict. Let us make peace.
The day of peace is nigh. Come, let us embrace it.
Haven't I defeated you already?
Here to beg for mercy, perhaps?
Are you here to admit defeat?
Why would a backstabber such as yourself come back here?
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is staring defeat in the face, thanks to our combined efforts.
When {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is gone, who shall we fight against next?
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} is a total pushover.
My people and I are hopeful that your current war is going well.
I would wish you good luck in your current conflict, but that would be a lie.
I wish for peace, but your posturing makes me fear that war is on the horizon. Is it?
Too many of your troops linger near our mutual border. Pull them back, unless you mean war.
While I agree that all empires have a right to expand, you have taken too much, far too quickly. For the sake of peace, please curtail your reckless expansion.
You have greedily taken far more land than is rightfully yours. You will pay for this greed soon.
Must you buy EVERY good piece of land you see?
You spend gold to steal land while I spend gold to buy brand new weapons for my soldiers. Who do you think will benefit the most from their investment in the long run?
We would never share our diplomatic secrets with villains like you!
Do you honestly think I would tell a criminal like you my foreign policy?
Why would you waste your time asking about my foreign affairs? They are none of your business!
Why do you continue to waste my time with this nonsense? Begone!
Did you not hear me the first time? Go away!
I'm sorry, are you hard of hearing? The answer will always be no!
I'm sorry, but we haven't known you long enough to divulge our diplomatic secrets. Maybe in the future?
We haven't known each other long enough for me to reveal my foreign policy. The answer is no.
I only give away my foreign policy to those whom I trust. I cannot trust someone I've just met.
I'm sorry, but we prefer to keep our diplomatic secrets safe. Try again some other time.
My advisors deem it important to keep our foreign policy private. Maybe some other time?
We're not comfortable broadcasting our foreign affairs at this time. Perhaps another time?
I will not field such requests at this time. Please stop asking.
We've been over this before. I will not tell you of my affairs.
The answer remains no. We shall not provide diplomatic details at this time.
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a true friend and can be trusted. (Friendly)
I'm quite fond of {1_PlayerName:textkey} and look forward to our continued friendship. (Friendly)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I have been on good terms, and I see no reason why that would change. (Friendly)
I really don't have an opinion of {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Neutral)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is neither an enemy of mine nor my friend. (Neutral)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} doesn't bother me at all. (Neutral)
I'll be honest. I don't trust {1_PlayerName:textkey} one bit. (Guarded)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has alarmed my advisors and we are monitoring the situation. (Guarded)
We're keeping an eye on {1_PlayerName:textkey} due to recent incidents. (Guarded)
{1_PlayerName:textkey}'s rule taints this earth and I would see no problem with it ending. (Hostile)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} is a tyrant and a villain that needs to be taken care of. (Hostile)
Don't remind me that {1_PlayerName:textkey} still walks this earth... (Hostile)
I look up to {1_PlayerName:textkey} with great envy! (Afraid)
I marvel at {1_PlayerName:textkey}'s success. (Afraid)
Hopefully one day I can be as good a leader as {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Afraid)
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I are at war! ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
{1_PlayerName:textkey} and I are locked in combat. ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
I am currently settling a dispute with {1_PlayerName:textkey}. ([COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]AT WAR![ENDCOLOR])
I trust you enough to confess that I am planning war against {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Planning War!)
Don't be fooled by outward appearances. I plan to rid this earth of {1_PlayerName:textkey}. (Planning War!)
I'm sick of {1_PlayerName:textkey}'s presence and I plan on eliminating them soon. (Planning War!)
It may appear that I am friendly with {1_PlayerName:textkey} but that's all show. (Deceptive)
Think you can keep a secret? I plan on deceiving {1_PlayerName:textkey} at earliest convenience. (Deceptive)
I tell the world that {1_PlayerName:textkey} is a friend. I tell you in strictest confidence that that is not the case. (Deceptive)
Friend, please accept this offer as a gesture of gratitude for our friendship.
In your time of need I offer you a gift.
To show our support of our friendship, I offer your people this in hopes you will one day return the favor.
The relationship between our empires can only get better with time. Shall we exchange embassies to accelerate this process?
We should exchange embassies as a sign of goodwill.
I am interested in establishing an embassy in your capital. Does this arrangement suit you?
We would like to set up an embassy in your capital. Will you agree to this request?
The sharing of embassies will faciliate greater cooperation between our peoples. Do you agree?
Let us open our borders to one another. We have nothing to fear from each other, right?
Come, let us open our borders as a sign of goodwill and faith.
Even great empires like mine must open their borders to empires like yours.
America desires to open its borders to you. Will you do the same?
The Arabian people desire open borders. Come, let us come to an agreement.
The great Montezuma desires open borders. Would you defy him?
An open borders agreement will lead to great things.
The gates of Egypt are open to you, if yours are open to us.
England is a free land, and, as such, desires to share open borders with you.
An open borders agreement is essential to the tactical flexibility of both our armies, wouldn't you agree?
I believe that an open borders agreement is essential to our future relationship.
A closed border is symbolic of a closed mind. Come, let us share our borders, and our ideas.
The wilderness knows no borders. As such, let us make an agreement.
The samurai code demands that I open my borders to you. Will you do the same?
The Ottomans wish to venture into your lands. Will you agree to this?
Knowledge is power, and I believe we could both use more knowledge. Shall we open our borders to each other?
The glory of Rome knows no boundaries... except for yours. Shall we open our borders to each other?
An open border will benefit you far more than it benefits Russia. Come, now, isn't this a generous offer?
Cooperation is the gateway to enlightenment. Come, let us share our lands with each other.
My people desire to open their borders to you. Will you deny the Songhai?
An open borders agreement would benefit us both.
Will you allow my troops to enter your lands?
I need to cross your borders. Will you agree to this?
Please consider my request for open borders.
I admire your military prowess. Shall we make a Defensive Pact?
We should form an alliance, in order to bring ruin to our enemies. Do you want to make a Defensive Pact?
Our enemies surround us. If we do not work together, we will surely perish. Would you like to make a Defensive Pact?
The tyrants of the world would tremble at our feet, if only we were allied. Do you see the value in a Defensive Pact?
You possess a Strategic Resource that my empire could make use of. Shall we trade?
My military is in need of one of your Strategic Resources. Care to trade?
It seems you have a Strategic Resource that I need. Can you spare it?
My advisors tell me that you have a Strategic Resource of some value. Will you share it with me?
Does this exchange suit you? It doesn't look like you are using this Strategic Resource, and I need it.
You have a plentiful supply of Strategic Resources in your territory. Would you like to share them?
Let us trade. You have a Luxury Resource that I would like.
My people have expressed interest in one of your Luxury Resources. Shall we trade?
You have a fine assortment of Luxury Resources. Shall we make a deal?
You have a Luxury Resource that my people want. On their behalf, let's trade, shall we?
Though the Greeks are wealthy beyond compare, we do enjoy a good trade now and then.
Trade is the first step on the road to peace, friend.
Arabian merchants are legendary for their trading prowess. Come, let me show you.
Trade is the gateway to glory, don't you agree?
The riches of China are yours to command. For a price.
Egypt is interested in one of your trade goods.
Trade is the most civilized endeavor to which humans can aspire, is it not?
Only the greatest warlords dirty their hands in trade and bartering.
Trade is the counterpart of industry. Come, let us forge a deal.
Through trade comes understanding, and through understanding, peace.
Trade is one of the many great attributes of civilization.
We are honor-bound to complete a trade agreement at this time.
The Ottoman Empire thrives on trade. Come, let us make a deal.
The Persian people are famous for their fine crafts. Come, let me show you.
Trade is the first step towards understanding and friendship.
The riches of Russia are open to you, for the right price.
Siam wishes to trade. Will you?
Do not let the scene before you fool you. I am a trader first, and a warlord second.
You have lands I would like, and I think I have lands that you would like. Is an exchange in order?
Let us exchange territory, so that disputes over borders will never disrupt the fine peace we have established.
There is mutual benefit in the exchange of territory, especially these two cities. What do you think?
I admire your military prowess, and I would like to see it directed against one of my enemies. What do you think of this deal?
Your military is truly grand. I would like to offer you a chance to war against one of my enemies. Do you agree with this deal?
Your military power is undeniable, and could be a great force for change. Is this offer of war enticing?
On behalf of the sanctity of peace, I urge you to consider this offer.
The death and destruction caused by your current war has gone on long enough. Come, won't you consider this offer?
Too many have died in your current conflict. Is it not time to end this war?
My advisors have informed me that you are not yet committed to a vote for the upcoming World Congress session. What do you think of this proposition?
The upcoming World Congress session is very important to me. I would like to see this resolution achieved, and I need your help. Does this offer seem suitable?
Your vote on this World Congress resolution is very valuable to me. I hope that this offer reflects that. If not, mind telling me what it would take to earn your vote?
Cooperation and proper diplomacy are the hallmarks of civilization. Shall we continue to be an example to the rest of the world?
This was a fine deal, and my advisors and I would be sad to see it end. Shall we renew this agreement?
We have both prospered greatly as a result of this deal. Shall we renew it?
It is time to renew this deal. Shall we?
I hope that you have benefited from this deal as much as I have. Do you want to continue this arrangement?
Our past agreements simply aren't what they used to be. If we're going to continue being friends, I'm going to need a bit more from you.
This was a great partnership, but is no longer. If you want to renew this deal, we expect a little bit more from you.
Unfortunately, I'm not sure this deal is as beneficial to us as it once was. Perhaps you could sweeten the deal?
We are not open to your offer at this time.
I have no interest in this agreement.
I'll take it, but I'm not sure this is a fair deal for you.
I'm sorry, but I can't match your offer. I can, however, offer you this.
This is all I can afford to offer you in exchange for your substantial offer.
It saddens me that I cannot offer you more for your great bounty.
The Songhai people agree to your terms, though we must admit they are unfair to you.
Regrettably, the auspices are unfavorable to that course of action for you. Continue, if you must.
With all of the goodwill in the world, I must inform you that our offer cannot match yours.
I hope you do not think I seek to take advantage of our intimacy with our lesser offer.
I am most regretfully unable to match to your terms.
I have offered everything we possess, unto our very last farthing. It seems we cannot match your offer.
I am honor-bound by the gods to inform you that our offer is not as valuable as yours.
Honesty is a great virtue, thus I must admit that our offer is nowhere as good as yours.
I have sent for our finest offerings, yet this is all I can muster. Do you like it?
Such a grand offer... it is a pity that this is all we can offer you in return.
The sacrificial pits seem to be a bit empty today... is this offer good enough for you?
Great as I am, it seems I cannot match your offer. Is this at least suitable for you?
Unfortunately, your kind and generous offer cannot be matched by us. Is it acceptable anyways?
A living God should want for nothing, yet it seems I cannot match your offer. Is this offer suitable?
I mean no disrespect with this offer, it is simply all that I can scrounge up at the moment.
This is all we can offer you. I would give you my turban as well, but I cannot live without it.
I do not wish to set a precedent for unfair deals with other nations, therefore I admit that our offer is less valuable than yours.
The Heavenly Throne is, shamefully, unable to match your glorious offer. We can, however, offer you this.
This is as much as we are able to offer you at this time. Take it or leave it - I do not care either way.
The bounties of trade and empire seem to be on your side. Despite this, do you like our offer?
You flatter me with your offer. Unfortunately, I am not sure that I can reciprocate such flattery.
Like a great wave, your offer is bounteous yet disturbing. I cannot match it, but I can offer this.
I seem to have left the rest of our trade goods in another longboat... is this deal acceptable in spite of this?
My advisors inform me that our offer is underwhelming. I disagree, but anyways, what do you think?
What? Who? I'm sorry, the voices in my head tell me that our offer is bad. Is it? I'm not sure.
I would offer more, but I've spent too much time talking and not enough time pillaging. Is this acceptable?
I wish I could offer more, but I cannot. Is this acceptable?
Unlike Iarbas's hide, I cannot stretch this deal any further. Is our underwhelming offer acceptable in spite of this?
The Lion of the North has little more to offer than this. Do you accept?
Your offer is so much better than ours that it has ruined my appetite. Do you like it anyways?
You offer many great things, yet we do not. Do you like our offer anyways?
Oh darling, what a wonderful offer! It is a shame that we can only offer you such trinkets in exchange.
My great wisdom demands that I tell you that your offer is better than ours. Do you like our offer in spite of this knowledge?
I want what you offer, but I am not sure you will want what I offer. In spite of this, do you accept?
As a trader, I must inform you that our offer cannot match yours. This is the best we can do.
I would add a few scrolls and books to our offer if it would sweeten the deal, but I doubt it. Do you accept our lesser offer?
I knowingly make a poor offer to you, but I've now admitted it, so therefore it is your fault if you accept it.
Even I can see that your offer is better than mine. I still wish to trade, though - do you?
What a grand gesture. I would reciprocate if I could, but this is the best we can do.
I'm so sorry, but this is all we can offer. Do you like it?
Our offer is inferior to yours, but, if you accept it, I will invite you to Carnival next year. Agreed?
I cannot lie to you - our offer is inferior. In spite of this, do you like it?
A warrior's word is his honor. Because of this, I must admit that we cannot match your trade.
This is the most we can stomach to offer to you for your outrageous offer. Take it or leave it, fiend.
Bah! You are a fool to offer us so much. We will offer you far less, as you can see.
What makes you think we would match your offer, even if we could? This is what we will offer you.
An impossible offer that we cannot hope to match. You are simply embarrassing yourself, especially if you accept this trade.
This is the best we can do. If you accept this, you will be a laughing stock at home and in our country.
Want more? Too bad, this is all we can offer you. Go somewhere else if you don't like it.
You need to improve your pathetic trading skils. There is no way we can match your offer.
Does this suit you?
I have a proposal for you.
Are you interested in this deal?
Excellent.
Why not?
I'm fine with this.
Really? Absolutely!
Are you sure? I won't turn down such generosity.
I am humbled by this agreement.
Looks good to me.
I find this acceptable.
You drive a hard bargain. I accept.
Impossible. I know you can offer more than that.
This deal will not work if you won't offer a bit more.
You and I both know that you can offer a bit more.
You must be joking. Right?
You can do better than that.
Do you take me for a fool?
Come, now, you can do better than that.
This isn't going to work if you keep trying to trick me.
Are you trying to insult me?
I will acquiesce to your demands, this time.
You ask for too much, but I must accept.
Your demands are harsh, but I cannot refuse. Our relationship will suffer as a result of this.
Your demands are too great. I cannot agree to them.
I will not cave to your greed. The answer is no.
Do you think I am a pushover? I will give you nothing.
This barrage of insane demands can only lead to war.
You are a barbaric and greedy person, did you know that?
You are an avaricious knave. I will give you nothing.
No way. You are weak and lack the force to make such demands.
You and I both know you can't enforce that demand.
You are a fool if you think I'll give you anything for free.
Not a chance. Perhaps you should try such tactics on someone less capable than I.
You will get nothing from me, tyrant.
Never!
Impossible.
You must be joking. No way.
Absurd. Is this a joke?
I am glad to help.
May this gift bring prosperity to your people.
It is my pleasure to assist those in need.
I'm sorry, but I've already offered as much assistance as I can at this time. Maybe some other time.
It's been too soon since our last show of generosity. I'm afraid I must decline.
I cannot service this request at the moment. I'm sorry.
I'm sorry. My generosity does not extend as far as you'd like, I'm afraid.
You have asked for simply too much, I'm afraid. I cannot comply.
Absolutely not. I am a generous person, but that is too much you are asking me to give up.
No offense, but you have something I want, and I'm fairly certain that I can take it from you.
Wonderful.
You made a wise decision.
I have fallen on hard times, and I could use some help. Can you spare this, friend?
I have nowhere else to turn. Could you give this to me, as a friend?
My people need assistance, and they look to you. Surely you cannot deny them this help?
Mighty Alexander... needs help. Will you give me aid?
Your help at this time would be invaluable.
I have fallen on hard times, and am in dire need of assistance.
Your assistance will keep our fires burning and our altars filled with blood. Won't you help?
It pains me to ask, but could you help the Empress Dowager of China?
Though gods rarely ask mere mortals for assistance, I must ask for such from you.
The English people need your help. Will you heed their call?
A gift to France will be repaid with kindness. Come, do not hoard your wealth.
Germany is in dire need. Will you heed the call?
Karma is earned by those who share their wealth with the less fortunate.
The forests are lean this season, and I could use some help.
Even the mightiest warrior is sometimes in need of assistance.
The Throne of Osman asks for your help at this time.
A gift to the Persian Empire would cement our lasting friendship.
Mighty Rome needs a helping hand. Can you spare this?
I am embarrassed to say this, but Russia needs your help.
A gift to Siam at this time would greatly improve our relationship.
The Songhai people need your help. Please, do not turn us away.
Thank you.
I am grateful.
You have made a wise choice.
Let us end this war. I have other, more important business to attend than your empire.
We will spare your people from further harm if you sign this peace treaty.
Let us celebrate peace in our time.
I hope this is the last war we fight.
This war must end sooner or later. How does this agreement look?
I am tired of battle. Come, let us settle this in the boardroom, instead of on the battlefield.
Let us end this war, as it is ruining us both. Would you agree to this?
Yes?
What is your proposal?
What will it take to end this war?
My armies cannot be stopped.
The time for diplomacy is long gone.
Not a chance.
Impossible.
I agree. Our friendship will be a model for others to follow.
Wonderful idea. Let us celebrate the occasion with a feast!
Fine, but I'm telling everyone that it was my idea.
Friends? Already? We barely know each other.
Look, you are really nice, but I need some time to think about this level of commitment.
Shall we make a public Declaration of Friendship? Such an act would be a model of civility for the lesser empires of the world.
I believe that you are an honorable and righteous leader. Let us make a Declaration of Friendship, so that others may look upon our pact with fear.
This world can be a lonely and isolating place, and we could each use a strong ally. Shall we make a Declaration of Friendship?
A Declaration of Friendship would be of great benefit to both of us. Come, let us show the other empires of the world what 'civilization' truly means.
We have not always seen eye to eye in the past. A Declaration of Friendship could change that. What do you say?
I do not trust you, yet my advisors tell me that a Declaration of Friendship with you is a shrewd diplomatic move. Shall we?
A Declaration of Friendship might show the world that we are willing to put past transgressions behind us. Do you agree?
Our history is filled with strife and conflict. Why don't we put it all behind us with a public Declaration of Friendship?
Our people have grown close over the years. It would be a shame to see this relationship decay. Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship?
You have proven to be a trustworthy friend, a rare trait in this world. Do you wish to renew our Declaration of Friendship?
We have shown the world that cooperation is possible. Come, let us show them again. Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship?
Our Declaration of Friendship has lapsed. Much good came from the previous arrangement, thus I believe we should try again. Shall we?
Greetings, old friend. My advisors tell me that our Declaration of Friendship has lapsed. Surely this is simply a clerical error, yes? Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship?
Our friendship has stood the test of time. It would be a shame to see it end now. Do you want to renew our Declaration of Friendship?
There are few people in the world I trust more than you. It would be wise of us to renew our Declaration of Friendship. Do you agree?
You are a great friend, and I cannot remember a time that we were at odds with each other. Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship one more time?
Once more into the breach, dear friend. Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship?
I have been, and always shall be, your friend. Will you reciprocate this sentiment, and renew our Declaration of Friendship?
We have forged a legendary alliance over the years, have we not? Come, let us renew our Declaration of Friendship.
The future will tell tales of our historic alliance. Shall we renew our Declaration of Friendship?
Our ideological differences are simply too great. I cannot stand by our Declaration of Friendship any longer.
Your religious views no longer mesh with mine. As such, I must end our Declaration of Friendship.
Our paths have diverged, and I see now that you desire some grand goal more than our relationship. Consider our Declaration of Friendship ended.

Your treachery will bring the wrath of fate itself upon you. Our vengeance will be absolute.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](If you denounce this player or declare war on them within the next [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]10[ENDCOLOR] turns, you will receive a diplomatic penalty for backstabbing them.)

Of all the people in the world to betray me... so long as I breathe, we shall never be friends again.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](If you denounce this player or declare war on them within the next [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]10[ENDCOLOR] turns, you will receive a diplomatic penalty for backstabbing them.)

You have gone too far this time. I thought we were friends, but now I see the truth.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](If you denounce this player or declare war on them within the next [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]10[ENDCOLOR] turns, you will receive a diplomatic penalty for backstabbing them.)
I see no choice but to fight you. I am sorry that it must end like this.
You should have seen this coming. You didn't? I almost feel bad. Almost.
I was never your friend. Consider this a lesson in politics.
Come now, don't be upset. This is only betrayal if you are a fool.
I felt a little guilty leading you on like that, but the reward will be oh so sweet.
Once more our armies shall meet on the battlefield. We might have been friends once, but there is too much bad blood now for that.
Ah yes, our oldest enemy. I look forward to clashing with you once again.
Enough is enough. Someone has to stop your bloody rampage soon, and it might as well be me.
It falls to me to prevent the world from succumbing to a new dark age.
This Cold War has gone on long enough. Let us settle this ideological dispute once and for all.
Your ideological values have no place in this world. I shall soon destroy you.
Though you profess to believe in the same values as I, your actions betray you. I shall scour you from the earth, false friend.
We may share an ideology, but even that is not enough to keep me from hating you. You will be destroyed soon enough.
My empire needs more land. Your land, to be precise.
It is unfortunate for you that we are neighbors.
Your lands shall soon be mine!
I will die before I give in to your tyranny.
Your strength does not compensate for your wickedness.
If I am to die, I will die with dignity. You wouldn't understand.
For those who are about to die, I salute you.
Today is a good day to die.
This war will serve as a clarion call to those who can, and will, defeat you.
Fortune favors the bold, not the strong.
History honors the brave, not the wicked. You shall be nothing but a footnote.
The world shall be mine!
There is not room on this planet for both of us.
Mine shall be an empire to circle the globe!
There can be only one leader on this planet... and it will be me.
You have played right into my trap.
There's no use in hiding it any more: I seek to destroy you.
The day of your defeat is nigh!
You shall be but a footnote of history.
Your defeat is inevitable. Surrender now, or else.
Your armies will be wiped clean from the face of the earth.
I saw an opportunity, and I have taken it. Don't take it personally.
You are weak, and I am strong. This was inevitable.
War is the only solution to our current disagreements.
The time for diplomacy is over. I bring war to your doorstep.
We must fight. Prepare yourself!
No? I shall send a more forceful emissary, then.
I planned for this. Prepare yourself.
Your words are sharp, but our swords are sharper. I shall cut out your vile tongue myself!
I will not sit idly and take such insults. Prepare for war!
Your treachery shall not be forgotten.
This war will test both of our empires. Others may have fallen to your sword, but your campaign of violence ends here.
The foolish warmonger stirs the sleeping dragon. You have bit off more than you can chew.
We may lack your military strength; however, I would rather die a noble death than be a bloody tyrant like you.
I am not surprised you wish to fight me. Our conflict over the world's ideological future was bound to end in bloodshed.
This conflict was inevitable. Our ideological differences practically guaranteed war.
There are others who defy our ideological views, yet you attack me? Truly you have lost your way, old friend.
May the best warrior win!
I must admit, I've been looking forward to this.
It is about time that our armies meet on the battlefield.
I shall sow my fields with your blood.
You have played right into my trap. Prepare to be slaughtered.
You didn't really think this through, did you?
I laugh in the face of death, even if I stand alone!
This will be my moment of triumph.
My people wail in horror at this decision. Why?
What have I done to deserve this?
We could have been allies, yet you chose the path of violence. A pity.
You are a miserable tyrant.
What an awful decision on your part.
You are a buffoon.
You would attack us? How foolish.
History will mock you for this.
You have made a terrible decision.
This is going to be fun.
Death comes for you, fool.
You have condemned your people to defeat.
That was the last mistake you will ever make.
Excellent. Right into my trap.
I have been looking forward to this.
Your end is nigh.
You are strong, but you lack conviction. I shall seize the day.
Your hubris will be your downfall.
You are misled if you think you can defeat me.
My armies will not be so easily defeated.
You will not defeat me.
I tried to overlook your misdeeds, but I can do so no longer. You are a tyrant, and tyrants must be admonished.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
There is no point in hiding it any longer: I used to like you, but now I hate you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Surely, even you must understand that there is only one path for this world's future. And you are travelling down the wrong one.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You have betrayed not only me, but also your own people, by accepting this ideology. Listen to us both before your actions lead to even worse conflicts.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

The greed and ambition of your people will only destroy them in the end. Allow your people to throw off the yoke of Freedom, and stop spreading your lies before it is too late.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your imperialist aggression has grown tiresome. Cease trying to convince my people to follow the path of Freedom before I am forced to take drastic action.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I know that you are trying to cause a worker's revolution in my lands. For my nation's stability and yours, cease this evangelizing of Order at once.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Keep your radical Order beliefs away from my people's ears before I show you what 'better dead than red' really means.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your supposed military might is not enough to hide the cruelty you inflict upon your own people from the world. Cease your tyranny before we are forced to declare war against you![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Other nations may hesitate in fear of you, but for the sake of this world, ours shall be the one to take a stand. Renounce your belief in Autocracy before it is too late![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Even from this far, I hear your people calling out for liberty and justice! If you will not heed their words, these may be the last ones we speak in peace.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Democracy, a free press, and a free market are the rights of all people. Our nation shall no longer watch while you continue to trample on the hearts of your citizens![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your people's voices call out for economic justice and social equality. As long as you deny the righteous path of Order, we will never be able to see eye to eye.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Why do you continue to deny the rights of your workers to live without the evils of hunger and poverty? If it takes this denouncement to end their suffering, so be it.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Without a strong leader to guide them, your nation stands on the edge of a knife. It is not too late to accept the path of security and stability - do not force my hand.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your choices have made it clear that only one nation has the strength to lead this world to prosperity: mine. Join me or suffer the consequences.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I have stood by long enough while your armies lay waste to this world. I can only hope this denouncement will finally put a stop to your ambitions.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your thirst for blood is an abomination, tyrant. As long as I have breath, the entire world will know of the cruelty you have inflicted upon it.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I have made it clear that those City-States you have been rubbing shoulders with are mine, not yours. You may make alliances with them, but you shall never have one with me.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

If you think it is diplomacy to steal my allied City-States, you are sorely mistaken. For every alliance you have wrested from me, I will ensure you have made another enemy in return.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You are a vicious bully and I have had enough of you preying on the weak. Face me, coward, if you have the guts to stand against someone your own size.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I have appointed myself the protector of those City-States and yet you continue to torment and oppress them. I have informed the other leaders of your cowardice - do not invoke my wrath further.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Those weapons of war you have used are an abomination to humanity. Anyone willing to commit such atrocities against innocent civilians is clearly beyond redemption.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Nothing I can say or do will make up for the horror of your crimes. I can only hope that this denouncement will discourage other leaders from ever using such awful weapons again.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your attempts to steal my technological secrets can no longer be tolerated. I have spoken to the other leaders about your attempted espionage and they will be prepared in the future.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I have always believed in transparency and honesty, but it is clear that you do not. If you prefer to work in the dark, then it is up to me to shed a light on your deeds.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I have made it clear that those lands you have taken are rightfully mine. If we cannot settle these land disputes diplomatically, pray we don't have to settle them on the battlefield.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You can call it 'coveting' your lands if you wish. But as far as I am concerned, I cannot covet what you have stolen from me. I believe the other leaders will see it the same way.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

I warned you that declaring your allegiance with my enemy would be a mistake. Now face the consequences of your actions![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

The Declaration of Friendship you have made with my enemy is a betrayal I cannot accept. Your people are no longer welcome in my court.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Other leaders have told me you aren't to be trusted. I may not know all the details, but I believe them more than I believe you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Whatever you have done to invoke the wrath of the other leaders, I am confident that you deserve it. May our denouncements serve as a lesson to you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

The only thing worse than a tyrant is a scheming one. If you are incapable of speaking the truth, then I will have to do it for you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your behavior is beyond despicable. May this denouncement teach you that dishonesty and avarice are poor examples of foreign policy.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
You have proven to be a danger to my people, and you must be admonished for this.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
Of all the people to be deemed unfit for this world, I did not think it would be you. Too bad.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
I tried to overlook your actions, but I can do so no longer. You are a tyrant, and tyrants must be admonished.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
There is no point in hiding it any longer: I used to like you, but now I hate you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You have proven beyond doubt that your friendships mean nothing. Spare us your prattering - there will be no more words between us.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Unlike you, I am honest about who my friends and enemies are. For instance: you have just made yourself my enemy. Never return to this court again.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

The genocide you have committed against my people can never be forgiven. All the world shall know the horrors of what you have done.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Do you even stop to think of the innocents you killed? My people will not be able to rest until their families and loved ones are avenged... and neither will I.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your people's sacrilegious beliefs are a plague upon this land. I wished this day would not come, but if your people will not see the light, then we are fated to be enemies.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

That I have allowed your heathen faith to spread this far fills me with disgust. Any nation that willingly believes in such falsehoods can never be trusted.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Your disrespect for our borders and cultural artifacts has reached a breaking point. From now on, neither your archaeologists nor your diplomats will be welcome here.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

The cultural artifacts of my people are not yours for the taking. The other leaders will soon know of your brazen theft.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

So many years spent planning and building those Wonders... how could someone like you have built them first? Have you stolen secrets from me?! The world will know of this treachery![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
Those are some incredible Wonders you've built. It would be such a shame if something were to... happen to them.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Do we not seek the same ends? It seems like such a shame that we cannot see past our differences and work together for the betterment of the world.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You and I both know who is destined to win this competition. For the sake of both of our peoples, give up before this esclates into further conflict.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

You are coming too close to victory for comfort. I have spoken to the other leaders and we agree that the time has come to take a stand against you.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])

Allowing you to take control of the world would be a grave mistake. The time has come to put an end to your ambitions - at any cost.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
You are an awful person, did you know that?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
There can be no peace in the world, so long as you exist.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
Why must you behave like such an imbecile?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
There are only a few words that describe you, and they aren't very nice.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
I cannot bite my tongue any longer. You are a tyrant.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
I hope death comes swiftly for you, knave.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
Don't take this personally, but... wait, no, take this personally: you are terrible.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us![ENDCOLOR])
Your cruel words have no power here. Begone!
You shall soon learn the magnitude of the mistake you have just made.
You are an absolute fool.
You may be honest, but that doesn't make you any less of a terrible, awful person.
My soldiers are excited at the prospect of war. To arms, ally!
War, you say? Give me 10 turns to muster my troops.
The time for war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} is nigh. Shall we combine our arms and strike down this villain?
{1_PlayerName:textkey} has gone too far, and must be stopped. I look to you for assistance: shall we fight this menace together?
The actions of {1_PlayerName:textkey} have forced my hand. War is inevitable, and I need an ally. Will you join me?
The war against {1_PlayerName:textkey} has come. Shall we?
Your military aggression must come to an end. Withdraw your troops, or prepare for war.
We shall see how honest you really are.
Let's see if your actions betray your words.
Oh dear.
Seems my fears were well-placed.
If you wish to fight, do so boldly. Sneak attacks are for cowards.
You would dare challenge the greatest warrior who ever lived?
I will not tolerate your bullying any longer. Remove your forces from my border, or else.
You think yourself wise, but only the fool fights the warriors of the desert. Bring war, or depart.
This can only end in your death. Your armies shall be led like lambs to the slaughter.
We do not fear your foolish posturing. If you wish to provoke the dragon, do so.
There is no victory in war for you. Do you still wish to fight?
England will not be bullied. Do you bring war, or are you as cowardly as I think you are?
Declaring war on me will be the last mistake you ever make. Test me, if you dare.
Your armies stand near Germany's borders. If you wish to go to war, know that it will bring nothing but ruin.
Though I follow the path of peace, I will not tolerate wanton aggression. India does not fear a brute such as yourself.
These woods are filled with innumerable Iroquois soldiers. Do wish to test them?
You think you move with the grace of the ninja, but your actions are plain to me. Either declare war, or be gone.
The Ottomans laugh at your foolish posturing. Do you really think you can defeat us?
The armies of Persia will not back down from a fight. If you wish to test this, do so now.
Think clearly about your next move: only the wisest and greatest warriors cross the Rubicon and live to tell the tale.
I will not tolerate your military posturing any longer. Do you wish to fight Russia, or not?
The Siamese people will not tolerate your aggression any longer. If you wish to fight, do not attempt to hide it any longer.
It is good that your armies are massed on my border, as it will save my soldiers the trouble of chasing them down. That is, of course, if you do, in fact, wish to fight.
We'll see about that.
I believe you... for now.
I knew this day would come.
So it is. We are prepared for war. Are you?
As you wish, I shall move my troops from your border. My apologies for any trouble caused by this incident.
Very well, I will redirect my armies elsewhere.
Understood. I will move my troops at once.
Please understand, my troops are merely passing through! We mean no harm to your empire.
Don't be alarmed. We do not wish to harm you. Our troops are merely running drills.
I apologize for any concern my recent troop movements have caused you. Our troops are merely passing through the area and we have no intention of war.
Maybe you're smarter than I thought. Perhaps you expected my eventual rise to world domination? Or maybe you're just stupid. Either way, time to die.
Honestly, there's no sense lying to you. You are merely a stepping stone to my ascent to greatness.
Ha! That's not the way I expect you to talk to your future ruler. Now, you must suffer.
I'll admit, at some point I thought you were a pretty good friend. However, it's time to show my true colors. My troops are aimed directly at your cities. Time to die.
What's this? Are you just trying to egg me on? Well, consider yourself lucky; you've succeeded. Prepare to die.
Your continued expansion is intolerable, and must be ceased immediately.
I hope your obsession with land ends soon enough, as it is beginning to strain our relationship.
There can be no peace between us if you continue claiming territory that is rightfully mine.
Your greedy expansion has fouled my impression of you. I thought you noble, but I see now that you are a fool.
Great. It is settled, then.
I hope that this is the last time we have to discuss this.
Though I thought my opinion of you could not be lower, it seems I was wrong. Not only are you a thief, you are also a liar.
Your broken promise is but the latest crime you have committed against my people. I will not forget this injustice.
I promise not to settle near your lands. For now.
I will not settle near your lands, but only because you asked nicely.
You are foolish to think that you can tell me what to do.
I settle where I please, when I please. The answer is no.
No way. I have plans for that territory.
Impossible. My people need that land.
Cease purchasing land near our borders immediately. Failure to do so will have serious consequences.
If you don't stop buying land near our borders we are going to have a problem. A serious problem.
You made the right choice.
I'm glad this won't become an issue.
Your promise to stop purchasing land near our borders was, naturally, a lie. I saw this coming.
You are a dishonorable person. I take promises, especially broken promises, very seriously.
Your war against {@1_MinorCivName} will not be tolerated any longer. They are under our protection, and we mean to enforce that promise.
We shall see.
I hope your actions do not betray your words.
You have captured {@1_MinorCivName}, a people you promised to protect. Are you always so untrustworthy?
Your behavior towards {@1_MinorCivName} is unacceptable. They are under my protection, and I will not tolerate such defiance.
We shall see if your actions mirror your words.
Your decision is the right one. If you really want to see our artifacts, come visit our museums instead of trying to steal them from us.
Watch yourself. Wars have been fought over less.
It pains me to do so, but I will send my archaeologists elsewhere. A pity, as I just finished building a Museum to house your artifacts.
There is nothing you can do to stop me. The world's artifacts belong to me!
Your agents escaped my grasp this time, but they shall not be so lucky in the future. You shall tempt fate if you dare to spy on me again.
As a friend, I am willing to forgive you for spying on me... this time.
I hope your spy's death has taught you a valuable lesson about thievery. If not, go ahead and send another of your spies this way... we have plenty of ammunition.
I hope that this circumstance serves as a lesson to you.
You are nothing but a thieving coward.
It is good that you captured and killed that rogue spy who claimed to be working for me. Wait, you don't believe me that he was rogue? Well, that's just foolish of you.
Greetings! Let's not discuss petty things like spying, or the fact that you caught one of my spies... please?
I am glad we can put this nonsense behind us.
I am relieved that you are not upset.
It saddens me that this mistake has permanently scarred our relationship.
I must admit, I knew you would feel that way.
Fine, I'll send my spies elsewhere. There is not much to learn from you, anyway.
As you wish, I will make sure that all my spies are informed to ignore your empire for the time being.
I know you are hiding something dreadful, and my spies will not stop until I uncover it.
Your vile beliefs pollute our lands and sully the morals of my people. Send your bringers of lies elsewhere, lest our religious differences spill over into bloodshed.
Enough is enough. Your incessant proselytism will be tolerated no longer. Stop sending your missionaries into my lands, or face the consequences.
You have made a wise choice, and my people thank you for it.
This will end in nothing short of violence, I assure you.
We will spread our beliefs elsewhere, though I still believe I was doing your people a favor.
Our faith warns us against idolaters such as you. We will not rest until you and your people follow the one true religion.
You isolate yourself with such statements.
I have nothing else to say to you.
How can you be so brazenly foolish?
You are a brute.
This will not end well.
This {@1_CivAdjective} plot will fail, thanks to you. My people will hear of your good deed.
I thought you would like to know that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. I always knew they were up to no good.
{1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. I hope this warning does not arrive too late.
{1_PlayerName} is preparing a naval invasion of your city of {2_CityName}. I hope this warning arrives in time for you to put it to good use.
{1_PlayerName} is preparing for a naval sneak attack against you. I am sorry that I could not uncover more information than this.
I recently learned that {1_PlayerName} has an army headed towards your city of {2_CityName}. Consider this warning a favor, one that I hope you will one day return.
Prepare yourself! {1_PlayerName} is about to launch a sneak attack against you! If anyone is planning the same for us, I do hope you will let us know.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} has bribed {2_PlayerName} to go to war with you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
Our spies have uncovered that {1_PlayerName} and {2_PlayerName} are preparing to go to war with you. We hope that you will share any intrigue your agents discover with us.
{1_PlayerName} attempted to persuade us to start a cooperative war against you. I hope my rejection of their offer pleases you.
While {1_PlayerName} is my friend, I just told them their plan for a joint war against you was unacceptable. Beware their intentions!
Your culture has overawed my coarse and barbaric people. Our culture will be ground to dust under the weight of your mighty influence, however others surely remain who will contest your dominance.

I lament that the traditions of my ancestors are being swept away by the powerful force of your influence. Is this the beginning of an age of cultural darkness, or are you the bringer of enlightenment?
We were once a proud, independent culture, but now all that remains of our former glory rests on dusty shelves. Someday you too will join us in the archives of history ... but today is not that day.

I am happy to see that you have finally abandoned your miserable, barbaric customs. Do not despair, as it is far better for a culture to die by choice than by the sword ... though yours, perhaps, may succumb to both.
Do not fear the new way of life that has enthralled your people. You will soon forget all about the backwards and rude traditions you laughably called 'culture.'

There is little space now for the diverse traditions of bygone eras. Unfortunately for you, it seems that your culture has been pushed out. Don't worry, I plan on dedicating a large section of our new antiquities museum to you.
This world is not big enough for two would-be conquerors. My armies will meet yours on the battlefield soon enough. Prepare yourself!
Do you hear the footsteps of my armies? Fear me, and fear them, as there cannot be two world conquerors on this day. Your army stands in my way, but not for long.
You will soon bend your knee to my silver-tongued diplomats. Global hegemony shall be mine!
You'll be happy to know that I've just finished revising my acceptance speech for the position of 'Supreme Leader of Earth.' I do hope you'll attend the reception.
I received a shipment of your so-called 'cultural artifacts' the other day. How quaint. You will all soon know the meaning of true culture.
There is only room for one cultural conqueror on this planet. Prepare to be enlightened.
Though we both stare into the night sky and dream of interstellar empire, historians will remember only one of us for being the first to accomplish such a great task: me.
We shall soon slip the surly bonds of Earth and pierce the heavens in our shiny new rockets. I'm sorry, by 'we' I meant my people, not yours.
I have no idea what you are up to, or what kind of mark you are trying to make on history, but know this: we're watching you, and we have our own plans.
One of my historians came by the other day to ask me about you and your impact on world history. Do you want to know what I told him? Nothing, because you have done nothing of note.
Greetings, friend. I just wanted to let you know that your good opinion of {1_CivName} mirrors my own.
Your friendship with {1_CivName} has reinforced my opinion that you are a wise and noble leader.
{1_CivName} and I agree that you are a worthwhile friend to have in this world.
The mutual friendship you and I share with {1_CivName} makes our friendship all the stronger.
Your declaration of friendship with {1_CivName} inspired me to do the same. I hope such fair and honest actions will persist well into the future.
It is good to know that {1_CivName} has friends like you. Together, I truly believe we can make the world a better place.
Your friendship with {1_CivName} is an example to us all, and I want to be a part of it. I hope that others will see the benefit of such cooperation.
Denouncing {1_CivName} was a big mistake. I, and others, will not stand idly by while you say such foolish and false things.
While your lies about {1_CivName} may fool some, they haven't fooled me. I'm watching you.
{1_CivName} is nothing but trouble. If you seek an alliance with them, you will soon find yourself isolated on the world stage.
I'm not sure what you see in {1_CivName}. Whatever it is, it reinforces my feeling that you are of dubious intellect.
I would be careful around {1_CivName}. Sticking close to them will end badly for you.
Any friend of {1_CivName} is not to be trusted. I've got my eye on you.
Are you sure you want to align yourself with {1_CivName}? This won't end well for you.
How can you be so foolish? An alliance with {1_CivName} will bring you nothing but hardship.
{1_CivName} really is awful, no? Hopefully your harsh words will teach them a lesson.
It is about time someone else denounced {1_CivName}. I was beginning to think that I am the only reasonable person on this planet.
{1_CivName} is terrible, and I'm glad you agree. Come, let us retire to my office so we can conspire against them.
Denouncing {1_CivName} was the best decision I've made in a long time, and I have your example to thank for it.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was very wise. This shall be a profitable diplomatic alliance.
What an excellent proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I hope you understand how much I appreciate this action.
You are a fool. Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} will do nothing but sow conflict between us. Is that what you want?
I cannot view your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} as anything but an insult. You would be wise to reconsider your views.
Your support of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName} was essential. I hope we can work together again in the future.
You made a wise choice, supporting our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. My people are indebted to you.
You foiled our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. I'll make you pay for this.
I just learned that you are largely to blame for the failure of our proposal to the {1_LeagueName}. You are a terrible person.
We are the host of the {1_LeagueName} thanks to you. I promise to do my best to support your proposals in the future.
The {1_LeagueName} is under our control because of wise leaders like you. Together, we can make the world a better place.
What a brazen act of theft. The world will hear of this.
That was a huge mistake.
Thank you for returning our citizens.
You are a wise leader. My people sing your praises.
You have returned my citizens, and for that I am eternally grateful.
Hail, citizen! The path of Freedom lies before us, and none shall stand in our path. Let the darkness of the world tremble before the light of liberty!
Let others tremble at our shared belief in Order. We have nothing to lose but our chains. We have a world to win. Workers of the world, unite!
Greetings, fellow warlord! Our mutual decision shall decide the future of humanity: it shall be either our view or theirs, as there can be no compromises!
You have made a wise and noble decision. The message of Freedom is one of compassion and acceptance, virtues that I hope you will embrace and share with others.
You have embraced Order, and will now be a part of our glorious future. It is a good thing, too, as our proletarian revolution shall soon claim the entire world!
The new world order of Autocracy is a force that cannot be denied. Your decision to join our cause was inevitable, and will lead to a great and triumphant future.
My people demand that I grant them a constitution, civil liberties, and even the right to vote! This is your doing, isn't it?
The workers in my cities refer to themselves as members of the proletariat, and speak of global revolution! Must we all reject the trappings of property and statism like you?
My people speak of a 'third way' that promises great reward and even greater glory. Must all empires glorify the sword, as yours does?
The clarion call of freedom cannot be silenced by your oppressive regime. Grant liberties to your people, so that we may all prosper under the banner of Freedom.
Your ideology will soon be thrown upon the dust heap of history. Join the worker's revolution, or be trampled by it.
The insatiable lust for war stirs in the hearts of your people. Embrace the warrior's spirit, lest I be required to force it upon you by the sword.
Our current conflict with {@1_MinorCivName} is purely circumstantial, and has no bearing on our relationship with you. I do hope you understand this.
I've recently learned that {@1_MinorCivName} is under your protection. Do not take my actions against this city-state personally.
I sincerely hope that my war with {@1_MinorCivName} will not make you think less of me.
You wouldn't understand. I did what had to be done.
You have proven your diplomatic ignorance.
Your friend, {@1_MinorCivName}, stands between me and my dreams of a grand empire. Are you going to intervene, or not?
The lands of {@1_MinorCivName} will soon be mine. Care to do something about it?
{@1_MinorCivName} will fall to my armies soon enough. How will you respond? With silence? How appropriate.
A wise choice.
You are a coward.
Just as I suspected.
Sure. Whatever.
A foolish statement.
I'm not surprised you said that.
The recent tribute we exacted from {@1_MinorCivName} was not meant as a slight to you or your declaration of protection. I do hope we can move past this.
You are mistaken in your views, and are thus on the wrong side of this discussion.
{@1_MinorCivName} benefits very little from your protection, it seems. I reminded them of this when I recently demanded tribute from them. Care to prove me wrong?
I'm not surprised.
Pfft. Whatever.
The weakness of your army is an embarrassment matched only by your pathetic leadership.
Your walls will do you no good if you have no soldiers to defend them.
You have far too much faith in the goodwill of your neighbors. Your lack of an army makes you a juicy target.
We have the bomb, and we are not afraid to use it!
Harassing the weak simply shows the world how petty and miserable you really are.
You are a bully, and bullies always end up on the dust heap of history.
The amount of human misery in your empire is appalling. I might have to come over there and show your people what real leadership looks like.
Are really that bad of a leader, or are you simply cruel? How barbaric.
The size of your empire is worrisome. Are you trying to be a city-state or something?
You really need to expand, if only so that there are more cities in the world for me to conquer.
Your economy is the laughing stock of the world. Do you need some help or something?
When I look at your pathetic economy, it makes me sad. I'd help, but I'm too busy being rich and powerful.
You are barbaric and crude. Shall I send one of my artists over to show you what real culture looks like?
Your culture is the embodiment of darkness and solitude. And no, that isn't a compliment.
I've met barbarians that are more cultured than you.
You are a cruel and miserable person.
I would compare you to a city-state, but at least city-states have integrity.
You are like a bad dream that simply won't go away.
I'm surprised someone hasn't wiped you off the map yet. A pity.
Your power and majesty are unparalleled. I hope to one day become a powerful ruler like you.
I must admit that I both admire and fear your great power. You are an example to us all.
Your conquests have lessened my opinion of you. Greatly.
Why must you be such a brute? Such warmongering will only lead to sour relations between us.
Your continued aggression draws great interest around the world. And not in a good way.
Just so you know, I have my eye on you. Bloodthirsty conquerors never win in the end.
Your relationship with {1_MinorCivName:textkey} is intolerable. Send your diplomats elsewhere, or face the consequences.
{1_MinorCivName:textkey} told me recently that they think you are a foul and terrible person. Perhaps you should focus on a different city-state, and leave this one to me?
I see that you are friends with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. So am I. This is quite awkward, is it not? You should probably leave them alone.
I found {1_MinorCivName:textkey} first, therefore I have the right to work with them, not you. Can't you find a different city-state to lay claim to?
Great!
Fantastic.
Perfect.
Really? Wonderful.
Sorry, but the answer is no.
That simply won't work.
I do not see the value of that agreement, so no, I think not.
I cannot hide my disappointment.
Really? Oh well.
I am saddened by your decision.
Impossible.
What a foolish decision.
You are in the wrong here.
What did you have in mind?
Yes?
The answer is still no.
